name: Guacamole With Blue Cheese and Bacon
description: Bacon and blue cheese bring smoke and funk to the table. Enjoy it on tortilla trips or try it as a topping on burgers and sliders.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound bacon, cooked until crisp and crumbled

recipeInstructions.text: Combine guacamole, blue cheese, and bacon, reserving some bacon bits and blue cheese as garnish. Serve immediately with warm tortilla chips.
